answers.answer: Be sure that the thyroid hormone levels are OK (TSH, free T4 and free T3), if so in my opinion he must have a metabolic reason for that, what about urinary infection?, diabetes?, gluten intolerance? Did you go to the ENDO or PED? I would get a second opinion.
